ol.li: Begin by transforming your document using your customization CSS.
In the output folder, you will find a [MAP_NAME].merged.xml file (or if you are using the DITA Map PDF - based on HTML5 & CSS transformation, a [MAP_NAME].merged.html file).
Open the merged file in the Oxygen XML Editor/Author.
Activate the XPath Builder view ( Window Show View XPath/XQuery Builder ).
Paste your XPath expression and press the Execute XPath button. Check if it returns the expected results.

body.p: The XPath builder has a function that allows it to display the document path of the current element from the editor ( Settings drop-down menu Update on cursor move ). Alternatively, you can right-click the element in the merged document and select the Copy XPath action, then paste it in the XPath builder.
